name: The Inside World
description:
The Inside World is an early prototype for an action-adventure game on the Atari Lynx. It was made for the console 30th birthday contest. 

You wake up in a strange place, surrounded by machines and weird electronic constructions... While trying to make sense of this strange world, you're surrounded and arrested by the guards of the Emprocessor, and thrown in the silicon jail.
 Helped by a w﻿andering bit, you escape the prison and find a laser gun... but now a herd of corrupted PCB is on its way to erase you... Will you escape the Inside World?

You can play it online or you can download the rom on this page (you will need an Atari Lynx emulator or a flash cartridge for the console).

The game is still in development.
